attributes.action: Petition to reduce the salary threshold for the dependent skilled worker visa
attributes.additional_details: Support small and medium size enterprises that can not meet the current salary bar.
attributes.background: Petition to Reduced the salary threshold for the dependent skilled worker visas to a level that reflects realistic market wages across a broader range of sectors and regions.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what level you would like the salary threshold reduced to and the type of support you'd like to provide to SMEs.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729798
